Adjust Dolby Sound settings to experience immersive, multidimensional sound that envelops you, bringing movies, music, and games to life
Tap here to personalize sound quality
With Sony\'s 360 Reality Audio Upmix (360 Upmix) technology, you can enjoy spatial and immersive sound with regular stereo sources\nCheck 360 Reality Audio for details.
The 360 Upmix app will always take priority over the other effects you\'ve turned on (either Dolby Sound with 360 Upmix or just 360 Upmix by itself) for the media sound of apps.

While playing Dolby Sound content or 360 Reality Audio content, the content's information will take precedence over the settings on this screen. High resolution content can also be play properly when both Dolby Sound and 360 Upmix are turned off.



About Spatial Audio
To enable the 360 Reality Audio feature, turn on Spatial Sound.
Dolby Sound does support Spatial Audio.
Disabling this setting will stop the device from charging

If Battery Care is enabled, the device will start charging only when the following requirements have been met:
 1. You have enabled charging by toggling "Enable Charging".
 2. Your device's battery level is lower than the charging limit you've set.


Charging stops when a specified percentage is reached to increase the lifespan of the battery.
Setting that limit to 80% yields even better results.
